name: Durak!
description: Durak is a classical Russian card game. While it requires strategical thinking, cheating is also a viable strategy as long as you don't get caught. In the same spirit pay attention to your opponents or else you might get tricked and be left as the Durak! The game is best enjoyed with 1 to 5 friends.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: x86 (64-bit) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
